content:
Sure, I can simulate a city building game for you.

Initially, the city population is 0, funds are 1000, income is 0, and the available buildings to construct are:

* Residential (100 funds, +10 population)
* Park (50 funds, +5 population)
* Factory (200 funds, +15 population, +50 income)

As the player constructs buildings and the population grows, new buildings will become available to construct:

* Shopping Mall (500 funds, +25 population, +100 income)
* Police Station (300 funds, +20 population)
* Hospital (600 funds, +30 population)

I can also keep track of the current population, funds, income, and available buildings after each action and display them to the player. Let me know what actions you would like to take and I will update the city accordingly.
